positive_examples: This is an example of voting game.
The voting game demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed voting game in this context.
A typical case of voting game would involve these features.
The concept of voting game applies here.
A cooperative game modeling collective decision-making processes where players vote on outcomes.
negative_examples: This is an example of evolutionary game, not voting game.
This represents cooperative game in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvolutionaryGame, or other types of CooperativeGame

definition: A cooperative game modeling collective decision-making through voting.
